Items.PromotionMaterial:
Vaccination Programs
The end-to-end program includes website registration and ordering, delivery of products to the site, administration of vaccines, data and insight reports to evaluate effectiveness, as well as options for ongoing patient management programs. Our patient care solutions help to tackle access and education barriers while our sophisticated supply chain expertise ensures the integrity and quality of vaccines to the last mile of distribution.
